    • Method Detail

      • loadAd

        public void loadAd()
        Method to load the InterstitialAd content. When it is ready, the InterstitialAdListener.onAdReady(InterstitialAd) will be called. InterstitialAdListener.onAdError(InterstitialAd, AdError) will be called. It instantiates an AdRequest object with the saved User Profile as AdRequest can only be called once per InterstitialAd object. Must be called on the MainThread.

      • loadAd

        public void loadAd(AdRequest request)
        Method to load the InterstitialAd content. When it is ready, the InterstitialAdListener.onAdReady(InterstitialAd) will be called. InterstitialAdListener.onAdError(InterstitialAd, AdError) will be called. Can only be called once per InterstitialAd object. Must be called on the MainThread.
        Parameters:
        request - the parameters that will serve as a filter on the advertisement request.

      • onActivityAttached

        protected void onActivityAttached(android.app.Activity activity)

      • getInterstitialAdView

        protected com.inlocomedia.android.ads.interstitial.InterstitialAdView getInterstitialAdView()

      • show

        public void show()
        Method to present the InterstitialAd on the screen. After being called, it will fill the screen with the advertisement content. Can only be called once per InterstitialAd object. Must be called on the MainThread

      • setInterstitialAdListener

        public void setInterstitialAdListener(InterstitialAdListener listener)
        Sets the InterstitialAdListener
        Parameters:
        listener - the InterstitialAdListener

      • setRequestTimeout

        public void setRequestTimeout(int timeoutInSeconds)
        Sets the timeout for the InterstitialAd request.
        Parameters:
        timeoutInSeconds - the timeout in seconds
